item.title: Diogo Jota's children lead tributes before Liverpool v Wolves
item.description: Liverpool and Wolves pay tribute to Diogo Jota as his two former sides meet for the first time since his death.

item.title: Jota's children lead tributes before Liverpool v Wolves
item.description: Liverpool and Wolves pay tribute to Diogo Jota as his two former sides meet for the first time since his death.

item.title: New York blanketed in snowfall, sparking travel chaos
item.description: Hundreds of flights have been cancelled and more than 3,000 were delayed by the winter storm.

item.title: Nine arrested in Italy for allegedly raising millions for Hamas
item.description: Police say the suspects raised around €7m (£6m) for the militant group over more than two years.

item.title: Gordon Ramsay's daughter Holly weds Olympian Adam Peaty
item.description: The celebrity chef says he "couldn't be a prouder dad" as his 25-year-old daughter ties the knot.
